column5: Hit LSC with Iceguy and another buddy.  The action was hot early with Iceguy putting this beauty in the boat.     Rob did a great job handling this fish and it swam away healthy!      Looked like so much fun that I thought I'd give it a try.  All I needed was a volunteer - and this lovely fit the bill.      An awesome day on the water once again!!!
Great stuff fella..some nice fish there! I hope to be takin lots of those pictures, over the next 5 days, down K'bec way !
nice fish for shure guys glad ya had a great time you got lucky wit hthe wind yesterday it was blowin hard from the NW with alot of white caps.
Thanks SilveradoSheriff for the great day of fishing, I'll be trying there again.I'll try to get some of the video we shot up tomorrow. Thanks again.
Awesome muskies !!!!! great pics too  ,man LSC, has been producing really big fish this year.WTG    cheers
Beauties for sure! The second pic is my favourite. Seeing that at my feet would scare me if it weren't attached to my line first.
